index.description: I am an experienced software developer based in Peru, specializing in building exceptional websites. Occasionally designing. Passionate about combining beautiful code with beautiful design.
index.aboutMeText:
Hi! My name is Hans Felix software developer based in Peru.

My goal is to create websites that help companies achieve their business goals, taking care of design and user experience.

These years I have been helping construction companies to digitize their processes developing web applications.

Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:
